english.segment1: Have you ever been haunted the way I've been by you. And have you ever felt the measure of the days that I've spent waiting, pining for you.
english.segment2: I can't see the sun for the daylight. I can't feel your breath for the wind. I don't wanna step from these shadows, till you're comin back again.
english.segment3: I've dammed the emotions to keep my lanterns lit. I'm shaken by this longing that courses through my veins. In my mind I can't make sense of it.
english.segment4: I can't see the sun for the daylight. I can't feel your breath for the wind. I get so used to these shadows. Are you comin back again?
english.segment5: Do we give up this search and turn out the light?. And give up this holy ghost that rattles through the night?
english.segment6: I can't see the sun for the daylight. I can't feel your breath for the wind. I don't wanna step from these shadows, till you're comin back again.
